> *Chicken Tenders, the most basic of foods, yet somehow restaurants manage to screw it up. *

**TendieDex** is a comprehensive rating website for chicken tenders, nuggets, and equivalent crispy chicken offerings from restaurants, fast food chains, and frozen food brands. After consuming way too many chicken tenders, it's time to create the definitive index of rankings based on flavor, texture, visual appeal, and overall restaurant experience.

## üåü Features

- **Comprehensive Ratings**: Star ratings (1-5) for flavor, texture, visual appeal, and value
- **Price Tracking**: Basic pricing information for cost-conscious tender enthusiasts  
- **Restaurant Coverage**: Fast food chains, sit-down restaurants, and frozen brands
- **Ranking System**: Detailed rankings with pros/cons for each entry
- **Modern UI**: Clean, responsive design built with Tailwind CSS
- **Fast Performance**: Lightning-fast static site powered by Vite

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: TypeScript + HTML5
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS + PostCSS
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Runtime**: Node.js
- **Development**: [Coder.com](https://coder.com) + [Kiro.dev](https://kiro.dev)

## üöÄ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/tendiedex.git
cd tendiedex

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build
```

## üìä Rating Categories

Each chicken tender entry is evaluated across multiple dimensions:

- **‚≠ê Flavor** (1-5 stars): Seasoning, taste, overall deliciousness
- **‚≠ê Texture** (1-5 stars): Crispiness, juiciness, consistency  
- **‚≠ê Visual Appeal** (1-5 stars): Appearance, color, presentation
- **üí∞ Value** (1-5 stars): Price-to-quality ratio
- **üìç Availability**: Location coverage and accessibility

## üèÜ Coverage

### Fast Food Chains
McDonald's, Chick-fil-A, KFC, Popeyes, Raising Cane's, Zaxby's, and more

### Casual Dining
Applebee's, TGI Friday's, Buffalo Wild Wings, and other sit-down establishments

### Frozen Brands
Tyson, Perdue, Great Value, and premium frozen options

## üåê Live Site

Visit **[tendiedex.com](https://tendiedex.com)** to explore the full database of chicken tender rankings.

Alternative URL: [tendiedex.net](https://tendiedex.net)
